Description: Iron amulet pendant. Rectangular with a pierced trapezoidal handle. Double-sided with pseudo-Arabic (?) inscriptions on both and with a stylised scorpion, lion and three Seals of Solomon on one side.
Curator's comments: The shape of the amulet is very similar to the large brass amulet plaques in the collection produced roughly the same time with figural images and inscriptions. See for example, OA+.2609, OA+.2607 and OA+.7408.
